channel.title: Need a 517 server coder
channel.description:
I need this stuff done.
---Things to Do--- Add RuneCrafting Add FULL Woodcutting Add FULL Cooking Add Agility Emotes Add FULL Mining Add FULL Warriors Guild Make Slayer Tower with tasks Add 100% Dueling Fix Morrigan Javelin and Axe Fix Bank Tabs for 525 Fix Npc Noclip, And a method to keep npcs from walking on each other. Redo Clan Wars Fix deposit X Fix withdraw X Fix Trading offer all and offer X ---Things to Do A.S.A.P--- Add NPC dialouge FIX GODWARS NPC KILL COUNT Fix NPC Trade or NPC Bank option (NPC option 2) Make Mage short drain spec when used
i will include all donations and Co-Owner for the server if they can do this for me ^_^ Server will be 24/7 PM me at tweems@hotmail.com or master@cefaction.com
